errors.pattern: certificate.*not trusted|SSL.*error|HTTPS.*not working|unable to get local issuer
errors.cause: Charles root CA not installed on client/device

solutions.code:
# Help > SSL Proxying > Install Charles Root Certificate
# Then: Keychain Access > Certificates > Charles > Always Trust

# Help > SSL Proxying > Install Charles Root Certificate on Mobile
# Visit chls.pro/ssl on device
# Settings > General > About > Certificate Trust Settings

# Help > SSL Proxying > Save Charles Root Certificate
# adb push charles.pem /sdcard/
# Settings > Security > Install from storage

errors.pattern: HTTPS.*encrypted|cannot see contents|SSL Proxying not enabled|<unknown>
errors.message: SSL Proxying not enabled for host
errors.cause: Host not in SSL Proxying list

solutions.code:
# Proxy > SSL Proxying Settings
# Add: *.example.com:443
# Or: *:* for all hosts

# Add Location: Host: *, Port: 443
# Intercepts all HTTPS

errors.pattern: no traffic|device.*not connecting|mobile.*not working|proxy not used

solutions.code:
# Help > Local IP Address
# Or: ifconfig | grep 'inet '
# Configure device proxy to this IP:8888

# Settings > Wi-Fi > (i) > HTTP Proxy > Manual
# Server: <mac IP>, Port: 8888

# Settings > Wi-Fi > Long press > Modify > Advanced
# Proxy: Manual, Host: <IP>, Port: 8888

errors.cause: Client IP not in allowed list

solutions.code:
# Proxy > Access Control Settings
# Add IP address or subnet

# Proxy > Access Control Settings
# Enable 'Prompt to allow remote connections'

errors.cause: Trial expired or license not registered

solutions.code:
# Trial: 30-day, then 30-minute sessions
# Restart Charles to continue

# Help > Register Charles
# Enter license name and key

# Debug builds often have pinning disabled
# Or: Use app's debug/staging environment

# Use Frida to bypass pinning:
frida -U -l ssl-bypass.js -f com.app.name

# SSL Kill Switch 2 (jailbreak)
# Or: Objection for non-jailbreak
